pages.text: Before you can start reaping the rewards you will need to collect some $(item)Data$() about a mob, the handheld device that makes that possible is called the $(item)Deep Learner$().$(br2)The $(item)Deep Learner$() is a device that can detect whenever you deliver mortal harm to a mob.

It can turn your encounter with that mob into $(item)Data$() if you have a $(l:0_introduction/2_data_models)Data model$() attached to the $(item)Deep Learner$().$(br2)The $(item)Deep Learner$() Can have 4 attached $(l:0_introduction/2_data_models)Data Models$() at any given time.

If you hold the $(item)Deep Learner$() in your $(item)Mainhand$() or $(item)Offhand$() a HUD will be displayed showing you how much more $(item)Data$() you need before you reach the next $(l:0_introduction/2_data_models)Data Model$() $(item)Tier$().
